Author: lagideath
Text: Serious advise from a guy who had a girlfriend with these exact problems and ideas: DO NOT stop talking to him! He will feel like he did something wrong and won't understand what's going on. He will blame himself for it and it will break the two of you.   Please talk to him about this. He is your boyfriend and thus I assume that you trust him and that he trusts you.  Good luckâ™¡
